text: "Dirty Dancer" is a song by Spanish singer Enrique Iglesias. It features American singer Usher. It was released for Iglesias' album Euphoria (2010). It was also included on Usher's Versus EP (2010). ==Track listing== *;U.S. Digital download # "Dirty Dancer" (Single Version) (with Usher featuring Lil Wayne) – 4:05 # "Dirty Dancer" (Music Video) # "Dirty Dancer" (Remix) (with Usher featuring Lil Wayne and Nayer) - 4:04 *;German CD single / UK Digital download # "Dirty Dancer" (Single Version) (with Usher featuring Lil Wayne) – 4:05 # "Dirty Dancer" (Album Version) (with Usher) – 3:35 ==Charts and certifications== ===Album version=== Chart (2010-11) Peak position scope=row scope=row scope=row scope=row scope=row Slovakia (IFPI)Note: insert 201123 into search. 2 scope=row scope=row UK Singles (Official Charts Company) 194 ===Single remix=== Chart (2011) Peak position Australia Dance (ARIA Charts) 9 scope=row scope=row Canada (Canadian Hot 100) 11 scope=row scope=row scope=row scope=row scope=row Mexico Airplay (Billboard)https://www.billboard.com/music/usher/chart-history/MEX 49 scope=row scope=row Romania (Romanian Top 100) 25 Russia (Airplay) 18 scope=row scope=row scope=row US Billboard Hot 100 18 US Hot Dance Club Songs (Billboard) 1 US Pop Songs (Billboard) 17 ===Certifications=== ===Year-end charts=== Chart (2011) Position Canada (Canadian Hot 100) 62 Romania (Romanian Top 100) 75 US Hot Dance Club Songs (Billboard) 7 ==Release history== Country Date Format Label Australia May 9, 2011 Contemporary hit radio, nights radio Universal Music United States May 10, 2011 Contemporary hit radio Universal Republic Canada June 12, 2011 Digital download Universal Music Mexico United States Universal Republic Australia June 19, 2011 Universal Music Austria Denmark France Germany Netherlands New Zealand Norway Sweden Spain United Kingdom Polydor Records Germany July 22, 2011 CD single Universal Music ==References== Category:2011 songs Category:Dance-pop songs Category:Lil Wayne songs Category:Usher songs Category:Enrique Iglesias songs
